sense.name: direct
sense.examples: She steered the boat toward shore. He steered the team to a championship gold in the 1995 season. She steered me to the director of public relations. Prosecutors are examining whether he steered taxpayers'dollars to build a park next to his wife's day care center. Mariners used to steer by the stars. He steered around the abandoned bike.

sense.name: avoid
sense.examples: He steered away from questions about the likely duration of the U.S. troop buildup. He steered clear of the priesthood because he couldn't keep the vow of celibacy.
